price: Hakika Yeye ana uweza wa kumrudisha.
footnotes: Hakika Mwenyezi Mungu aliye muumba hivi hapo mwanzo, bila ya shaka ni Muweza wa kumuumba tena baada ya kufa kwake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
